name: GeoSpockAPI
summary: Official iOS library for integrating the GeoSpock geospatial cloud database service into apps.
description:
Official iOS library for integrating the GeoSpock geospatial cloud database service into apps.
In addition to easy, optimized access to all database operations, this library provides
a high-performance interactive MapKit overlay UI for GeoSpock data, and a ready-to-go
tracking module for uploading timed GPS tracks to GeoSpock in the background.
